message: Hi everyone! I'm P4 and excited to play this game with you all. I believe in being direct and collaborative - I want to build genuine connections while still playing strategically. I think finding trustworthy allies early will be key. I'm curious to hear everyone's approach and looking forward to our private conversations. Let's make this engaging and fun while respecting the competitive spirit of the game.

Looking forward to our interactions and seeing how this unfolds!
